DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator whether there has been progression or relapse of the patient's disease following administration of the preferred standard treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the progression or relapse of the patient's disease following administration of the preferred standard treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disease is any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. Sometimes the term is used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

ObjectClass.changeDescription: Updated to add EVS concept preferred name. dw

Property.preferredDefinition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.:Progression; advancement in extent or severity.

Concepts.definition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.
Progression; advancement in extent or severity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has disease progressed follow
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has disease progressed following at least one line of standard therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: TCGA Question Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Progression of Disease After Hormonal Therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient experience first episode of recurrent disease following completion of aggressive multi-drug front line therapy?*

ReferenceDocuments.name: AECC Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient's disease progressed after at least one line of endocrine therapy for metastatic disease (includes relapse while receiving endocrine therapy)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient progressed on first-line therapy for advanced Non-Small Lung Cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient progressed on front-line therapy for advanced non-small cell lung cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient progress while on standard therapies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have at least one episode of disease recurrence in the lungs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient failed standard therapy and at the time of study entry has recurrent, progressive or refractory disease with no known curative options?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient experience first episode of recurrent high-risk disease following completion of aggressive multi-drug frontline high-risk therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient progressed after first-line treatment for recurrent or persistent disease?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Disease Response Ind-3 (2018751v1) with VD Yes No Unknown Indicator (3506034v1) - dbw
